text: The 1939–40 Drexel Dragons men's basketball team represented Drexel Institute of Technology during the 1939–40 men's basketball season. The Dragons, led by 1st year head coach Lawrence Mains, played their home games at Curtis Hall Gym. ==Roster== ==Schedule== |- !colspan=9 style="background:#F8B800; color:#002663;"| Exhibition |- |- !colspan=9 style="background:#F8B800; color:#002663;"| Regular season |- ==References== Category:Drexel Dragons men's basketball seasons Drexel Category:1939 in sports in Pennsylvania Category:1940 in sports in Pennsylvania
title: 1939–40 Drexel Dragons men's basketball team
